sentence.Network_en: To a geologist, this is a simple limestone sinkhole.
sentence.Network_cn: 对地质学者来说, 这只是简易的石灰石污水池.

sentence.Network_en: Local authorities and geologists are still investigating what caused the sinkhole.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地官员及地质学家仍在调查此次地陷发生的原因.

sentence.Network_en: In 2007 an approximately 30 - story - deep sinkhole ( pictured ) swallowed several homes and killed three people Guatemala City.
sentence.Network_cn: 2007年危地马拉一个大约30层深的 大洞 吞掉了很多房屋,并导致3人死亡.
